body_html:
This is the makefile I am using now.

`
CXX=g++

CFLAGS = -c -std=gnu++0x -msse2 -DCMAKE_CXX_FLAGS=-D__GLIBCXX_USE_CXX11_ABI=0

LDFLAGS = -L/usr/local/lib -L/usr/local/cuda-9.0/lib64 -L/usr/local/cuda-9.0/lib -lcudart -lcublas -lcurand
-lglog -lgflags -lprotobuf -lleveldb -lsnappy -llmdb -lboost_system -lm -lopencv_core
-lopencv_highgui -lopencv_imgproc -lboost_thread -lstdc++ -lcblas -latlas
-L/home/ficha/Documents/external/pytorch/build/lib/ -lcaffe2_gpu -lcaffe2
-lhdf5_hl -lhdf5
-lopencv_imgcodecs
-L/home/ficha/Documents/external/pytorch/build/lib
-L/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu
-L/usr/local/cuda-9.0/lib64
-L/home/ficha/Documents/external/pytorch/thrid_party

INCLUDE = -I. -I/usr/local/cuda-9.0/include
-I/home/ficha/Documents/external/pytorch/aten/src
-I/usr/local/include
-I/usr/include
-I/home/ficha/Documents/external/pytorch/build/caffe2/proto
-I/home/ficha/Documents/external/pytorch/thrid_party
-I/home/ficha/Documents/external/pytorch/caffe2_include

SRC = demo.cpp
OBJS = $(SRC:.cpp=.o)
EXE = demo

all: $(SRC) $(EXE)

clean:
rm -f *.o
rm -f $(EXE)
find ./ -name _.o -delete

$(EXE): $(OBJS)
$(CXX) $(OBJS) $(INCLUDE) $(LDFLAGS) -o $@

.cpp.o:
$(CXX) $(CFLAGS) $(INCLUDE) $< -o $@
`

if you need anything else please let me know.

body:
This is the makefile I am using now.

`
CXX=g++

CFLAGS = -c -std=gnu++0x -msse2 -DCMAKE_CXX_FLAGS=-D__GLIBCXX_USE_CXX11_ABI=0

LDFLAGS = -L/usr/local/lib -L/usr/local/cuda-9.0/lib64 -L/usr/local/cuda-9.0/lib -lcudart -lcublas -lcurand \
					-lglog -lgflags -lprotobuf -lleveldb -lsnappy -llmdb -lboost_system -lm -lopencv_core \
					-lopencv_highgui -lopencv_imgproc -lboost_thread -lstdc++ -lcblas -latlas \
					-L/home/ficha/Documents/external/pytorch/build/lib/ -lcaffe2_gpu -lcaffe2 \
					-lhdf5_hl -lhdf5 \
					-lopencv_imgcodecs \
					-L/home/ficha/Documents/external/pytorch/build/lib \
					-L/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu \
					-L/usr/local/cuda-9.0/lib64 \
					-L/home/ficha/Documents/external/pytorch/thrid_party

INCLUDE = -I. -I/usr/local/cuda-9.0/include \
					-I/home/ficha/Documents/external/pytorch/aten/src \
					-I/usr/local/include \
					-I/usr/include \
					-I/home/ficha/Documents/external/pytorch/build/caffe2/proto \
					-I/home/ficha/Documents/external/pytorch/thrid_party \
					-I/home/ficha/Documents/external/pytorch/caffe2_include


SRC = demo.cpp
OBJS = $(SRC:.cpp=.o)
EXE = demo

all: $(SRC) $(EXE)

clean:
	rm -f *.o
	rm -f $(EXE)
	find ./ -name _.o -delete

$(EXE): $(OBJS)
	$(CXX) $(OBJS) $(INCLUDE) $(LDFLAGS) -o $@

.cpp.o:
		$(CXX) $(CFLAGS) $(INCLUDE) $< -o $@
`

if you need anything else please let me know.
